caption: This video tells the story of how, due to the aging of the sun, humans install engines on the earth to drive the Earth to find new habitable places. The opening scene of the video shows a father and son playing by the beach and enjoying the scenery. In the evening, the father told the grandfather that he was leaving him and that the grandfather would adopt the son. In the next scene, the father is selected as an astronaut to enter the space station and falls into hibernation.
